text: I had the Harvest platter and I hate to say it but I wasn't impressed. Maybe I went into it with too high of expectations given the past reviews. I felt the <hummus> had too much tahini and not enough other flavors and the <falafel> was over cooked. Furthermore, I wish they gave me more <pita bread>. The <chili sauce> was good though. Price wasn't terrible, but I just didn't think the quality was worth it. I probably won't buy from here again.
